title: Newly Redone Single Family Home,**!!**
posting_body: Newly 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home in Detroit.
Working on removing furniture left by former tenant.
Offering an outdoor space, this home is fronted by a large patio.
All major utilities included: heat, water, sewer, sanitation and electric.
Tenant responsible for phone, cable and internet.
Pets allowed.
Rent is $850 per month.
Rent includes utilities, bills, water, sewer, trash and recycling.
The house has a small but complete kitchen, a "family room" no tv, an indoor washer/dryer, and 1 parking space.
It is in a lovely quiet neighborhood.
Although the house.
If you are looking for a comfortable place, this might be the place you are looking for.
Smoke free, pet friendly environment.
Great neighborhood.
Cats OK Dogs with landlord approval.
Recently renovated house.
$850 per month.
Off street parking.
